config.title: Settings
config.menu_image_s1: If the bottom of the image is gray, on some devices the image may not take up all the dedicated space.
config.menu_image_s2: In that case we recommend using a less wide image.
config.delete_modal_b1: By deleting the restaurant, all the dishes and menus associated with it will be lost.
config.delete_modal_b3: Do you want to delete the restaurant?
config.alertTitle: Configure the payment method to continue using Refoodlution without problems!
config.alertDescription1: It is within the trial period, once it ends you will not have access to the menu through the QR.
config.paymentDataAlertDescriptionMas14: Your trial period has expired. Set the payment method to reactivate the QR code on your letter.
config.alertDescription2: Configure the payment method to continue using Refoodlution without problems!
config.creditCardExpirySoonDescription: Update your credit card to be able to collect the next installment.
config.creditCardExpiredDescription: We will not be able to collect the fee since your card has expired. Update the card on the setup screen.
config.autoRenewalCheckDescription: You have the option to auto-renew your subscription disabled. Activate this option to be able to continue using Refoodlution once your subscription expires.

restaurant.name: Restaurant name
restaurant.new_b1: On this page you can create a new restaurant to manage from this account.
restaurant.new_b2: The price for each new restaurant is indicated in the pricing section of our website.

error.pwdLength: The password must be at least 8 characters.
error.imageSize: There was an error saving the image. The file may be too large.
error.imageReset: There was an error resetting the image.
error.restDelete: The restaurant could not be removed.
error.allergenDeclaration: Allergen declaration is required. In case you don't want to do it, check the box "Do not declare allergens".
error.menuRequired: You have to put a Menu name and add sections.
error.menuDeleted: The menu could not be removed.
error.restCreation: There was an error creating the restaurant.
error.userCreation: There was an error creating the user.
error.userExists: There is already a user with this email.
error.unexistantUser: There is no user associated with this email.
error.mailNotSent:
There was an error sending the email.
Try again later or contact us at clientes@refoodlution.com.
error.restoreFail:
Could not reset password.
If more than 1 hour has passed since the change was requested, the process must be repeated.
If the problem persists write us to clientes@refoodlution.com.

dashboard.noConfirmedEmail1: You are missing the last step!
dashboard.noConfirmedEmail2: Access your email inbox and click the link to activate your account.
dashboard.st_1: Enter the dishes on your menu
dashboard.st_2: Create your menus and assign dishes
dashboard.st_3: Put the QR code on your table
dashboard.preview_body_1: Click here to see a menu preview.
dashboard.preview_body_2: Keep in mind that customers will see it through a mobile screen.
dashboard.tuto_body: In this tutorial we will show you how to add dishes and configure your menu.
dashboard.noConfirmedEmail2OldRestaurant: Go to your email inbox and click on the link to activate your account. To resolve any questions, contact us.

dish.name: Name
dish.comment_body: If you have an option without, only traces or the possibility of substituting for another ingredient, you can add a message to the customer.
dish.m_2: Can be replaced by another ingredient
dish.preview_body: Only messages relevant to your allergies will be shown to diners

preview.noMenu: Oops! There seems to be no menu configured!
preview.errorWrongLocation: This menu cannot be accessed from this location.
preview.errorLocationPermission: Location must be allowed to see this menu.
preview.errorLocationUnavailable: The location could not be retrieved.

menu.name: Menu name
menu.noAllergens: Do not show food allergens on the menu.
menu.noDishes: Oops! It seems that there are no dishes added to the platform yet.
menu.deleteBody:
This action will only delete the menu.
Dishes will still be available on the dishes page.
menu.body: In this section you can create, edit and activate your menus. You can have multiple active menus at once.
menu.selectDaysInfo: If no day is selected, the card will be shown every day.
menu.sameHourAlert: This schedule overlaps with an existing one
menu.helpContent1: Select the days of the week when you want the menu to be visible. Add one or more time intervals for each day.
menu.helpContent2: You can combine different time slots on the same day (e.g., 12:00–15:00 and 20:00–23:00).
menu.helpContent3: If you do not select any day or time, the menu will be shown every day and all hours.

qr.box_body_1: The QR is unique for all menus.
qr.box_body_2: It is not necessary to download a new QR every time the menu is modified because the content is automatically updated.

translation.defaultLang: Select the language in which you have entered the dishes.
translation.configBody:
This is the language from which the translations will be generated.
In case you have entered them in multiple languages, we recommend choosing the most common one.
translation.chooseLang: Select the languages to translate to
translation.editTranslation: On this screen you can add, edit or delete the translations that will appear in your menu

login.recover_body: An email will be sent to confirm your account and you can change the password.
login.title: Welcome to Refoodlution!
login.koPromo: There is no promotion associated with this code.

emailConfirmation.confirmedEmailDescription: Click on the button to start using Refoodlution.
emailConfirmation.confirmedEmailDescriptionError: Reload the page or email customers@refoodlution.com
